text: Speaking as a lifelong Knicks fan, currently somewhat in remission (hah!), I have to say Fox Sports hit the nail on the head with the Knicks Hopeless campaign. The moment of max hopelessness was reading the headline that Tim Hardaway had gotten a $71 million contract and then learning that it was the Knicks who paid that for him. Until Dolan leaves, the Knicks will continue to sputter in hopelessness.
